channel.title: NYS:PSX on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:PSX on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: CPChem Cuts 130 Jobs as ‘First Step’ in Cost-Cutting Campaign
item.description: Chevron Phillips Chemical Co., a 50-50 joint venture between Chevron Corp. and Phillips 66, has cut roughly 130 jobs in the latest in a round of reductions sweeping through the Texas oil and chemicals
